long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
crossy road game is available in the chrome web store just install it and  play crossy road game .

Crossy Road Unblocked is a fun arcade game in the style of one of the most popular games of this genre Frogger. You must to control your character overcoming many obstacles, among which there will be logs, rivers, highways and even asteroids! The game has 3 worlds available - the original world of Crossy Road, space and the world of dinosaurs. Each of these worlds is distinguished by traps. Collect coins and discover new characters.

Note: There are many different games also available to play.

How to play Crossy Road :- 

Use the arrow keys to move sideways or forward. Don't stand in the way of upcoming cars, or other incoming objects.
